featured.title: LEGO Ninjago: Dragons Rising
featured.description: Ninja Master Lloyd guides Arin, a young Spinjitzu adept, and his friend Sora, who has an unusual Elemental Power, as a hidden enemy unleashes Elemental Monsters across the Merged Lands.

featured.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
featured.description: The ninjas gear up to save Ninjago City from a seemingly invincible foe â€” and find help from the most unexpected sources.

featured.title: LEGO DREAMZzz
featured.description: Mateo is a normal boy who realises that he must assert himself as the defender of dreams against the machinations of the Nightmare King.

featured.title: LEGO NEXO KNIGHTS
featured.description: Aided by digi-mage Merlok 2.0, knights Aaron, Lance, Axl, Macy and Clay bravely defend the kingdom of Knighton against Jestro and other evil foes.

featured.title: LEGO LEGENDS OF CHIMA
featured.description: In the once-peaceful land of Chima, conflict breaks out between eight animal tribes over Chi, a substance that can both sustain life and destroy it.

featured.title: LEGO Monkie Kid
featured.description: Teenage hero MK and his friends must save their city from the Demon Bull King, in the LEGO adventure inspired by classic Chinese stories.
